products.name: Overdraft(1176)
products.shortDescription: An overdraft is a flexible credit facility linked to your transactional current account that gives you access to additional funds. It is an excellent tool to help you manage unforeseen expenses and get through those tight moments between paydays.
products.specialFeature: To apply, click Select below, or visit any Nedbank, or call us on 0860 555 111
salesHighlights: Since an overdraft is linked to your transactional current account, there is no need to open a separate account.
The additional funds are available once your account balance reaches zero.
The overdraft amount is available, whether you use it or not, and you can use all or only a portion of it.
Interest is charged only on the portion of the overdraft you have used.
You will get a personalised interest rate on your overdraft.
You can choose to take out overdraft insurance, which ensures that you have peace of mind in the event of your death, disablement or retrenchment.

eligibilityRules.description: A valid SA Bar-coded Identity card/document
Three months bank statements (if non-Nedbank client)
You will also need to have a current account with us - either an existing account or we can open one for you when you apply for an overdraft.

products.shortDescription: Perfect for busy students, through free digital banking, this account gives you quick and easy access to cash.
salesHighlights: ZERO fees on card swipes.
ZERO fees on cash deposits of up to R3 000 at Nedbank ATMs. (Thereafter pay-as-you-use fees will apply).
ZERO fees on internal debit and stop orders
ZERO fees for one external debit order (non-Nedbank).
ZERO data usage when banking with the Nedbank MoneyApp™.
ZERO annual fees on your cheque card.
ZERO fees for balance enquiries and inter-account transfers on the MoneyApp™ and all other self-service platforms
Ability to make online purchases with your card.
Free access to the www.unlocked.me experience and major discounts on the site.
Pay-as-you-use fees will apply on other transactions, see the pricing guide

Rewards: Greenbacks Rewards is easy to understand and easy to use. Nedbank Greenbacks members earn Greenbacks on all eligible spend*. You earn unlimited Greenbacks 2X faster with the Greenbacks American Express® Credit Card and there are no expiration dates, caps or tiers.

You will earn accelerated Greenbacks with the Greenbacks American Express® credit card - 4 Greenbacks for every R10 eligible spend and 2 Greenbacks for every R10 eligible spend on the Nedbank MasterCard credit card.

You get to decide how you spend your rewards! Choose to Shop Invest or Donate your rewards. You can also spend your Greenbacks like cash with a FREE Nedbank Greenbacks SHOP Card, withdraw your Greenbacks as cash from any ATM or use your SHOP CARD internationally. The choice is entirely yours.
Affinities: Through the Greenbacks Rewards Program you can choose to support the development of the arts, the preservation and conservation of the environment, sports development or help orphaned and vulnerable children.
Green Affinity - Helping you support the environment at no cost to you
Children's Affinity - Helping the needy children of South Africa at no cost to you
Sport Affinity - Make sport development happen at no cost to you
Insurance: Optional mandate travel insurance cover available
Balance Transfer: The balance transfer option enables you to transfer credit card debt held at another financial institution onto your Nedbank credit card helping you lower the cost of your credit card borrowings and consolidating multiple credit card debts.
You get a preferential interest rate 11.9% over 12 months meaning you save on interest and pay a lower instalment for the balance transfer period.
You can organise your finances by consolidating multiple monthly payments into one.
You can transfer an amount that’s within the credit limit on your new card.
If you choose to close your other credit cards you can also save on fees.

productCategories.name: Borrow
productCategories.description: I need a loan to help me achieve my goals

productLines.name: PersonalLoan
productLines.description: School fees, unexpected bills, a holiday or home renovations? A personal loan can offer you the funds you need

products.name: Personal Loan
products.shortDescription: A personal loan is an easy and affordable way to better your life. Think about the good that a loan can do for you or your family, and you too can experience how a loan can pay you back.
salesHighlights: Loans available from R2 000 to R300 000*
Flexible repayment periods of 6 to 72 months.
Monthly repayments debited from your bank account.
The best possible interest rate that we can offer you.
Easy application process.
If your loan is approved, we will deposit the money directly into your bank account.

When you take out a personal loan, it is compulsory to have loan protection that will cover the outstanding loan amount should you unfortunately die, become disabled, are retrenched or unable to earn an income while you are still employed.  Our Personal Loan Credit Protection Plan will help pay off the outstanding amount of your personal loan if you cannot honour your repayments for any of these reasons. If you do not want to take out our Personal Loan Credit Protection Plan, you can take out an insurance policy with another insurer of your choice. This policy must offer the benefits that the Credit Life Insurance Regulations of 2017 require. Ask about our loan insurance when you apply for your loan.

products.name: Student Loan
products.shortDescription: Dreaming of becoming a lawyer, doctor or designer? Whatever your career aspirations are, a Nedbank Student Loan can take you there.
salesHighlights: A great interest rate with flexible repayment options.
If I'm a fulltime student, or still busy with an internship or articles, my guarantor only pays back the interest on my loan.
To only start paying back my loan once my studies are complete.
Optional competitive credit life cover in the case of death or disablement.

productLines.name: Overdraft
productLines.description: Get an overdraft facility linked to your account to manage your monthly cash flow needs.

products.name: Overdraft(1176)
products.shortDescription: An Overdraft is a revolving credit facility linked to a current account that provides access to additional funds. It is short-term borrowing facility that can help you manage unforeseen circumstances and cash flow constraints.
salesHighlights: An Overdraft is linked to the transactional account, and there is no need to open a separate account.
There is no need to transfer available funds between accounts, as the additional funds are linked to the transactional account.
The Overdraft is available whether it is utilised or not.
A fee for the service is charged whether it is utilised or not.
Interest is only charged on the portion of the overdraft utilised.

displayItems.displayName: What is a Tax Free investment?
data: A tax-free investment is one that allows you to invest up to R36 000 during the tax year and enjoy the proceeds tax-free.
Tax-free investments put you in control of your savings and encourage you to save while giving you the peace of mind that you can access your money easily.
Our tax-free unit trusts are Nedgroup Investments products, made available on the Nedbank Online banking. Nedgroup Investments is a subsidiary of Nedbank Group.

products.name: Nedbank TravelCard
products.shortDescription: The Nedbank Travel Card is a prepaid card, enabling you to transact seamlessly without having to carry cash while you travel abroad. The card is accepted around the globe, and you can load up to eight international currencies with locked-in exchange rates. All ages can apply.
salesHighlights: You can load up to eight international currencies with locked-in exchange rates.

With the Nedbank app or Online Banking you can:|manage your currency;|transfer the money on your card into your transactional account;|block your lost or stolen card; and|freeze your misplaced card and unfreeze it once you have found it.
When you use your card, it will automatically use the currency of the country you are visiting.
You can also get a backup card for free.

salesHighlights: You qualify for automatic local and international travel insurance when you buy return travel tickets using your Nedbank credit or cheque card. And even if you don’t, you still have the option to take out travel insurance.
Nedbank travel insurance includes free 24-hour emergency assistance, no matter where in the world you are. And if you want extra protection, you can easily top up your cover to add:
medical emergency cover (three different options), which all include luggage delays or loss, missed travel connections and ticket upgrades; as well as
pre-existing medical conditions.

We offer cover for senior travellers between 75 and 89 years old, and if you’re a regular traveller between three months and 74 years old, you can get cover at discounted rates every time you travel. We can even help you with embassy letters.
